DOC.brief_summary: Dose duration bisphosphonate therapy increase likelihood patient experience delay heal non-union fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Risk Radiographic Clinical Nonunion Patients With Previous Bisphosphonates Therapy .
DOC.detailed_description: We intend review UWHealth patient database identify individual delay nonunion fracture . Subsequently , collect associate medical information relate fracture age osteoporosis diagnosis , BMI , previous bisphosphonate treatment , type location fracture , time complete union , treatment need nonunion etc . With information , evaluate risk delay nonunion fracture patient previously receive bisphosphonate treatment compare normal population . We also investigate potential cause delay nonunion fracture population .
DOC.criteria: Men woman older 60 year old delayed nonunion low trauma fracture 01/01/2000 12/31/2011 .
DOC.keyword: osteoporosis , low trauma fracture , non-union fracture , delay healing fracture , bisphosphonate
